### Top AI Stories

1. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ Everything I've learned (so far) â€“ Part One â€“ Fine tuning](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381832)

2. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ OpenAI Functions](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36534635)

3. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ Vector DBs and Embeddings](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36447740)

4. [Show HN: AI-Powered Twitter Filter](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39210964)

5. [Show HN: AI/ML Weekly Digest â€“ Curated by LLM, Summarized and Sentiment-Analyzed](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37954932)

### AI Trends Summary

The series on experiments in Large Language Models (LLMs) explores various aspects of enhancing LLMs, including fine-tuning techniques for specific tasks, the utilization of OpenAI Functions for extending functionalities, and the integration of vector databases and embeddings for improved data handling and retrieval. Additionally, developments in AI applications are highlighted through an AI-powered Twitter filter designed to streamline content consumption, and an AI/ML weekly digest that leverages LLM for curation, summarization, and sentiment analysis, showcasing practical applications of LLMs in content management and user experience enhancement.

## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-03

### Top Stories

1. [A quick and easy way to visually save ideas](https://www.p4d.io)

2. [Building Yantra: A Visual Workflow Automation Engine](https://patali.dev/posts/yantra-workflow-automation/)

3. [The A.I.-Profits Drought and the Lessons of History](https://www.newyorker.com/news/the-financial-page/the-ai-profits-drought-and-the-lessons-of-history)

4. [Oxy is Cloudflare's Rust-based next generation proxy framework](https://blog.cloudflare.com/introducing-oxy/)

5. [Agent HQ: Any agent, any way you work](https://github.blog/news-insights/company-news/welcome-home-agents/)

6. [Cara Menghubungi CS OCBC](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45795639)

7. [Why home sellers are rejecting buyers' love notes](https://sfstandard.com/2025/11/02/trouble-letter-home-sellers-rejecting-buyers-love-notes/)

8. [My previous post suggesting that China annex Singapore and Australia clearly](https://twitter.com/BeijingDai/status/1984973886287470602)

9. [When fintech startups outgrow their own controls, Linqto's collapse as a warning](https://capitalfolly.com/linqto-cutting-corners/)

10. [Scala vs. F#](https://alexn.org/blog/2025/11/01/scala-vs-fsharp/)

### Summary

1. This item introduces a tool designed for efficiently capturing and organizing visual ideas, streamlining the process of saving and revisiting creative concepts.
2. Building Yantra represents the advancement in automating workflows through a visual engine, simplifying the creation and management of complex processes.
3. The discussion around the A.I.-Profits Drought examines the current challenges in monetizing AI technologies, drawing parallels with historical tech developments to extract valuable lessons.
4. Oxy, developed by Cloudflare, marks a significant evolution in proxy frameworks, leveraging the Rust programming language to offer enhanced performance and security features for modern web applications.
5. Agent HQ emphasizes flexibility in customer service, offering a platform that accommodates any agent model, thereby optimizing workflows and interaction strategies across various business contexts.
